body: Well, no, the buttocks *can* have meat in them, but these anime girls we see getting eaten are less muscle-bound and more ...generically curvy? My point is that only one girl in the entire manga had abs and any real sign of muscle, the rest just looked like your standard anime beauties in terms of body shape.

As someone who has prepared pigs for human consumption, the idea that you would actually eat straight buttock or breast deeply annoys me. There is almost no "meat" in those areas, you'd be eating all kinds of fat and other not-meat bits and pieces like mammary glands and that special tissue boobs are made of, no? Most of the actual meat on a person would come from the legs, the arms and possibly the abdomen if you were working with a particularly fit specimen -otherwise the human body doesn't seem to have enough meat on them to justify processing the majority of the body, i.e. the shoulders or the flanks.
